description: ***UPDATE: App is working again, sorry for any inconvenience!*** Just a quick app that I wrote for my two boys...they love trains and trucks, and this little app will occupy them for hours! Just choose which pictures you would like to view, then tap on the pictures to view a random selection of trucks or trains! New pictures will be added regularly, and there is audio coming soon! If you would like your own pictures added, simply email the picture to me at nicklas.demayo@rjamdev.info. Hope you enjoy!
